Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

The entity "Ischaemic coronary arteriosclerosis" is the only disease mentioned in the paragraph. The other terms, "hyperglyceridemic effect" and "changes in HDL cholesterol, Apo A-I and Apo A-II profiles" are not diseases, but rather effects or changes that are associated with the disease. Therefore, the table above presents the valid disease entity mentioned in the paragraph.
